justification: Offer ignores Team B’s conservative, floor-focused, injury-averse mindset and zero-RB lean. B needs healthy, stable producers and possession WRs; instead A offers a volatile deep-threat WR (Q) and an injured, volatile committee RB, asking for B’s healthy workhorse RB. Rationale centers on A’s needs, not B’s incentives or urgency for weekly stability. Trade is feasible but poorly aligned with B’s preferences and situation.
